Neck Training.name: Neck Bridges
Neck Training.description: Lie on your back and lift your head off the ground, supporting your weight with your neck.

Neck Training.name: Wrestler's Neck Bridge
Neck Training.description: Roll onto the top of your head and hold the position to strengthen the neck.

Neck Training.name: Chin Tucks
Neck Training.description: Tuck your chin toward your chest to engage the deep neck flexors.

Neck Training.name: Isometric Neck Holds
Neck Training.description: Press your hand against your head and resist movement in different directions.

Neck Training.name: Side-to-Side Neck Tilts
Neck Training.description: Tilt your head from side to side, stretching the lateral neck muscles.

Neck Training.name: Neck Flexion & Extension
Neck Training.description: Move your head forward and backward slowly to activate neck muscles.

Neck Training.name: Neck Rotations
Neck Training.description: Turn your head left and right to increase mobility.

Neck Training.name: Neck Retractions
Neck Training.description: Pull your head straight back while keeping your chin level to strengthen the deep neck muscles.

Neck Training.name: Wall Neck Press
Neck Training.description: Stand with your back against a wall and press your head back for isometric engagement.

Neck Training.name: Prone Neck Extensions
Neck Training.description: Lie face down and lift your head up while keeping the rest of the body relaxed.

Neck Training.name: Seated Neck Resistance
Neck Training.description: Use your hand to provide resistance as you move your head in different directions.

Neck Training.name: Neck Isometric Side Press
Neck Training.description: Press the side of your head against your hand without moving.

Neck Training.name: Lying Neck Lifts
Neck Training.description: Lie on your back and lift your head slightly off the ground, holding for time.

Neck Training.name: Neck Clock Drill
Neck Training.description: Move your head in a circular motion as if following a clock face.

Neck Training.name: Head Circles
Neck Training.description: Rotate your head in a circular motion to improve neck mobility.

Neck Training.name: Neck Side Lying Raises
Neck Training.description: Lie on your side and lift your head up slowly to strengthen lateral neck muscles.

Neck Training.name: Front Neck Isometric Hold
Neck Training.description: Press your forehead against your hand while resisting the movement.

Neck Training.name: Rear Neck Isometric Hold
Neck Training.description: Press the back of your head against your hand while resisting the movement.

Neck Training.name: Shoulder Shrugs
Neck Training.description: Lift and lower your shoulders to strengthen neck-supporting muscles.

Neck Training.name: Upper Trap Stretch
Neck Training.description: Tilt your head to one side while holding the opposite shoulder down.

Neck Training.name: Jaw Relaxation Drill
Neck Training.description: Gently open and close your mouth to relieve tension in the jaw and neck.

Neck Training.name: Towel Neck Resistance
Neck Training.description: Wrap a towel behind your head and press against it for isometric strength.

Neck Training.name: Neck Lateral Band Resistance
Neck Training.description: Use a resistance band for added difficulty while performing lateral neck movements.

Neck Training.name: Chin to Chest Stretch
Neck Training.description: Slowly lower your chin toward your chest to stretch the back of your neck.

Neck Training.name: Tennis Ball Neck Release
Neck Training.description: Lie on a tennis ball and move your neck slightly to release tension.

Neck Training.name: Forward Head Posture Correction
Neck Training.description: Strengthen neck muscles by pulling the head back into alignment.

Neck Training.name: Scalene Stretch
Neck Training.description: Tilt your head to one side and slightly rotate to stretch the scalene muscles.

Neck Training.name: Neck Waves
Neck Training.description: Move your head in a fluid, wave-like motion to improve mobility.

Neck Training.name: Neck Forward Reach
Neck Training.description: Extend your neck forward and return to neutral, activating deep neck flexors.

Neck Training.name: Neck Activation with Resistance
Neck Training.description: Use light hand pressure to resist gentle forward, backward, and lateral neck movements.

Neck Training.name: Shoulder Rolls
Neck Training.description: Roll your shoulders forward and backward to warm up the upper body.

Neck Training.name: Gentle Head Tilts
Neck Training.description: Tilt your head from side to side slowly for a gentle warm-up.

Neck Training.name: Nose-to-Collarbone Stretch
Neck Training.description: Turn your head diagonally downward to stretch the back of your neck.

Neck Training.name: Neck Joint Rotations
Neck Training.description: Move your head in slow circles to increase neck mobility.

Neck Training.name: Jaw & Neck Relaxation Drill
Neck Training.description: Massage your jaw and neck to release tension before training.
